column4: indeed. I believe Ubuntu's main strength is the superior documentation and user mass which provide help for new users. The Ubuntu philosophy is unsurpassed in the open source world - humanity towards others. The distro itself is far from the most advanced or bleeding edge, but it is good enough, stable enough and has documentation for 99% of your problems.
